data.name: HelpRT
data.value:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\nouicompat{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Segoe UI;}{\f1\fswiss\fcharset0 Segoe UI;}{\f2\fswiss Segoe UI;}{\f3\fnil\fcharset1 Segoe UI Symbol;}} {\colortbl ;\red0\green102\blue204;\red51\green153\blue102;} {\*\generator Riched20 10.0.26100}\viewkind4\uc1 \pard\cf1\b\f0\fs28\lang9 Skye Music Help\par \par \cf2\f1\fs24 Player Shortcuts & Functions\par \cf0 \b0 Toggle Play/Pause\par \b + \b0 Stop\par \b \b0 Toggle Mute\par \b \b0 Fast Reverse\par \b \b0 Fast Forward\par \b \b0 Previous Song\par \b \b0 Next Song\par \b \b0 Library\par \b \b0 Stream Directory\par \b \b0 Toggle Visualizer On/Off\par \b

\b0 Toggle MiniPlayer\par \b \b0 Fullscreen (When Playing A Video)\par \b \b0 Exit Fullscreen\par \b Play/Pause, Stop, Next, and Previous \b0 Global Media Keys may be used.\par \b \b0 on a video enables Fullscreen\par \b Minimize App On Screen Lock \b0 will stop play and minimize the app when the screen is locked or the screen saver is activated.\par \b \b0 while window is maximized will return the window to a normal state.\par \b \b0 on the Tray Icon to minimize the app, optionally minimizing to the Tray.\b\par \f2\lang9 \b0\f1\lang1033 on \f2\lang9 the album art to cycle to the next image (only applies if multiple images are available).\f1\lang1033 \f2\lang9 A small number badge in the upper\_right corner of the album art indicates how many images are associated with the current song.\f1\par \b \b0 on either Album Art, the Visualizer, or the Video will maximize the window or return it to a normal state.\par \par \cf2\b Playlist Shortcuts\cf0\b0\fs28\par \b\fs24 \b0 Select Up\par \b \b0 Select Down\par \b \b0 Play or Queue Song\par \b \b0 Remove Selected Songs from the Playlist\par \par \cf2\b Library\cf0\b0\fs28\par \b\fs24 \b0 closes Library.\par \b \b0\lang1033 on \f2\lang9 the album art to cycle to the next image (only applies if multiple images are available).\f1\lang1033 \f2\lang9 A small number badge in the \f1\lang1033 lower-left \f2\lang9 corner of the album art indicates how many images are associated with the current song.\f1\par \b \b0 on album art displays it at full size.\par \par \cf2\b Tag Editor\cf0\b0\fs28\par \b\fs24 \b0 on any art image displays it at full size.\par \par \cf2\b MiniPlayer\cf0\b0\par The MiniPlayer is a compact, always\f2\_on\_top version of Skye\f1\lang1033 \f2\lang9 Music designed for quick access, clean visuals, and minimal screen footprint. It gives you the essential\f1\lang1033 s: \f2\lang9 playback controls, \f1\lang1033 album art, \f2\lang9 track information, and a visualizer\f1\lang1033 , \f2\lang9 while staying out of your way.\f1\lang1033 \f2\lang9 The MiniPlayer is designed to keep Skye\f1\lang1033 \f2\lang9 Music visible while you work, browse, or game, offering a lightweight way to enjoy visualizers without opening the full window. It can be tucked neatly into a corner of your screen, making it perfect as a small \ldblquote desk companion\rdblquote version of the app that stays out of the way while still giving you quick access to playback and visuals. The MiniPlayer is intentionally simple\f1\lang1033 \f2\lang9 and unobtrusive.\par \par You can open the MiniPlayer from the main player\rquote s menu, from the tray icon by\b \f1\lang1033 \b0\f2\lang9 ing it, or by using the keyboard shortcut \b\f1\lang1033 <\f2\lang9 P\f1\lang1033 >\b0\f2\lang9 . \b\f1\lang1033 \b0 or \b

\b0 will close the MiniPlayer and reopen the Player. \f2\lang9 Closing the MiniPlayer never stops playback; it simply hides the compact view and hands control back to the main window, letting your music continue uninterrupted.\par \par Each visualizer offers an \f1\lang1033 "\f2\lang9 Allow MiniMode\f1\lang1033 "\f2\lang9 setting; when enabled, the MiniPlayer uses a version of the visualizer specifically optimized for small spaces, and when disabled, it displays the full visualizer exactly as it appears in the main window\f1\lang1033 , just in a smaller space.\par \par \cf2\b\lang9 Stream Directory\par \cf0\b0\f2 The Stream Directory is Skye\f1\lang1033 \f2\lang9 Music\rquote s built\_in browser for discovering and playing online radio stations. It provides fast search, clean filtering, and full transparency about each station\rquote s available streams.\par \par \i What You Can Do\i0\par - Browse thousands of stations from supported sources\par - Search by name, tags, country, or format\par - View bitrate, format, and status at a glance\par - Select from multiple stream URLs when a station offers more than one\par - Play a station immediately or add it to your playlist\par \par \i Columns Explained\i0\par - Name \endash The station\rquote s display name\par - Tags \endash Keywords describing the station\rquote s genre or style\par - Format \endash The audio format (MP3, AAC, etc.)\par - Bitrate \endash The stream\rquote s quality level\par - Country \endash The station\rquote s origin\par - Status \endash Whether the station is currently online\par - URL \endash The stream URL used for playback\par - (\f3\u9662?\f1 ) \f2\endash\f1\lang1033 The last column\f2\lang9 \f1\lang1033 i\f2\lang9 ndicates \f1\lang1033 whether \f2\lang9 the station has multiple stream options\par \par \i Selecting a Stream\i0\par Some stations provide more than one stream (for example, different bitrates or formats).\par To choose a specific stream:\par - Click the \f3\u9662?\f1 More column for that station\par - A menu appears listing all available streams\par - Each entry shows the bitrate, format, and a shortened version of the URL\par - Click the stream you want to use\par Skye Music updates the URL column automatically and uses your selection for playback.\par \par \i Right\f2\_Click Menu\i0\par Right\_clicking a station opens the standard context menu, allowing you to:\par - Play the station\par - Add it to your playlist\par - Copy the stream URL\par \par \i How Stream URLs Are Handled\par \i0 Skye\f1\lang1033 \f2\lang9 Music resolves playlist files (.pls, .m3u, .m3u8) automatically and shows you the direct streams they contain.\par This ensures:\par - Faster playback\par - More reliable history entries\par - No hidden or unstable URLs\par If a station provides multiple streams, Skye\f1\lang1033 \f2\lang9 Music \f1\lang1033 will choose the best rate and format automatically when you use the entry, but \f2\lang9 you stay in control\f1\lang1033 and are able to choose a stream from the drop-down menu as well.\f2\lang9\par \par \i Notes\i0\par - The Stream Directory updates automatically when switching sources\par - Some stations may appear offline if their streams are temporarily unavailable\par - Stream URLs can change over time; selecting a fresh one from the Directory usually resolves playback issues\par \par }

data.name: ChangeLogRT
data.value: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\nouicompat{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Segoe UI;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset134 SimSun;}{\f2\fnil Segoe UI;}{\f3\fnil\fcharset1 Segoe UI Symbol;}{\f4\fnil\fcharset0 Segoe UI Symbol;}{\f5\fnil Segoe UI Symbol;}{\f6\fnil\fcharset1 Cambria Math;}} {\colortbl ;\red0\green102\blue204;\red51\green153\blue102;} {\*\generator Riched20 10.0.26100}{\*\mmathPr\mmathFont6\mwrapIndent1440 }\viewkind4\uc1 \pard\cf1\b\f0\fs28\lang9 Skye Music v1.3 What's New\par \cf0\fs24 Released January 2026\cf1\par \b0\par \cf2\b New Features\par \cf0\b0\f1\lang1033\'a3\'ab\f0 Directory: Skye Music now includes a full Stream Directory, a complete in\f2\_app browser for discovering and playing online radio stations\f0 , making it easier than ever to find and play online radio. Browse stations by name, tags, country, format, or bitrate; and pick from multiple stream options with a simple dropdown. Everything loads fast and stays out of your way. See the Help window in app for details.\f1\par \'a3\'ab\f0 MiniPlayer: A compact, always\f2\_\f0 on\f2\_\f0 top version of Skye Music designed for quick access and minimal screen space. Includes essential playback controls, album art, and a fully integrated visualizer panel. Visualizers now support a dedicated MiniMode, providing simplified, optimized visuals tailored for small windows. Each visualizer can enable or disable MiniMode individually through its settings.\par \f1\'a3\'ab\f0 Skye Music now lets you know when a new version is available. The About screen performs a quiet daily check and displays an upgrade notice right under the version number.\f1\par \'a3\'ab\f0 Added Theming to all context menus, the Tray menu, and the Player menu strip.\cf1\b\lang9\par \par \cf2 Improvements\par \cf0\b0\f3\u10003?\f4\lang1033 Multiples of the same song are now allowed in the Queue.\f5\lang9\par \f3\u10003?\f0 Library file\f2\_watcher alerts now appear in the Playlist status text instead of the Library menu.\f5\par \f3\u10003?\f0 Changed the behavior of the Tray context menu options to open the Player, Library, and History. Removed the toggle so now clicking simply shows the window.\cf2\b\par \par Fixes\par \cf0\b0\f3\u10005?\f4\lang1033 Fixed a bug where window locations weren't showing correctly after Saving Metrics.\f5\lang9\par \f3\u10005?\f4\lang1033 \f5\lang9 Fixed an issue where radio streams would not play after restarting the app. Older history entries were missing information needed to identify streams. Skye\f4\lang1033 \f5\lang9 Music now automatically repairs these entries so streams load and play correctly.\par \f3\u10005?\f4\lang1033 Fixed an overflow when assigning the song title to the Tray icon.\f5\lang9\par \f3\u10005?\f4\lang1033 Fixed an issue preventing the MinimizeToTray option from saving.\f5\lang9\par \f3\u10005?\f4\lang1033 The Playlist selection no longer jumps away when using the arrow keys to navigate the list.\f5\lang9\par \f3\u10005?\f4\lang1033 The Tray Icon now loads after the app is initialized, as intended.\cf2\b\f0\lang9\par \cf1\par Skye Music v1.2\fs28\par \cf0\b0\fs24 Released December 2025\b\par \b0\par \cf2\b New Features\par \cf0\b0\f1\lang1033\'a3\'ab\f0 Added Donation links to the About window.\cf2\b\lang9\par \cf0\b0\f1\lang1033\'a3\'ab\f0 Added Tray Icon, with option to minimize the Player to the Tray. Find the new settings in the Options dialog.\f1\par \'a3\'ab\f0 Added Peak Hold Delay to Rainbow Bar Visualizer\par \f1\'a3\'ab\f0 Tag Editor. In the Library you can now edit the metadata tags for a song or songs. Full support for tag information as well as artwork & lyrics is included. You can also download artwork from the MusicBrainz online database.\f1\par \'a3\'ab\f0 Julia Fractal Visualizer. Introduces a dynamic fractal effect based on Julia set mathematics. The visualizer continually evolves and morphs in real time, producing intricate, organic patterns that respond to audio input.\lang9\par \cf1\b\fs28\par \cf2\fs24 Improvements\par \cf0\b0\f3\u10003?\f4\lang1033 Updated the About window with the latest project attributions.\f5\lang9\par \f3\u10003?\f4\lang1033 Tag Editor can now be opened directly from the Playlist.\par \f3\lang9\u10003?\f4\lang1033 Added tooltips to Classic Spectrum Analyzer's settings page.\f5\lang9\par \f3\u10003?\f4\lang1033 Changed "Added Not Played" History List to "Forgotten Songs" and included songs not played for over a year.\f5\lang9\par \f3\u10003?\f4\lang1033 Refactored History to include a Source Type field to track the type of media: File, Stream, or AudioCD\par \f3\lang9\u10003?\f4\lang1033 Refactored the Player to track the media being played by Source Type.\cf1\b\f0\fs28\lang9\par \par \cf2\fs24 Fixes\par \cf0\b0\f3\u10005?\f4\lang1033 Fixed issue with a blank window being shown when there was no album art.\f5\lang9\par \f3\u10005?\f4\lang1033 Fixed cursor "blinking" issue on Help, Log, and What's New.\f5\lang9\par \f3\u10005?\f4\lang1033 Fixed when changing system Accent Color, the Visualizers Settings Pages didn't update the background color.\f5\lang9\par \f3\u10005?\f4\lang1033 Fixed errors when using the context menu in Log, Help, and What's New.\f5\lang9\par \f3\u10005?\f4\lang1033 Fixed when the File Watcher adds new files to the Library or Playlist, they were not adding to History as well.\f5\lang9\par \f3\u10005?\f4\lang1033 Fixed when Lyrics text was too big for the Media Label multiple lines were shown. Ellipsis now shows again.\f5\lang9\par \f3\u10005?\f4\lang1033 Fixed crashing when minimizing while using Oscilloscope Visualizer.\par \cf1\b\f0\fs28\lang9\par \fs24 Skye Music v1.1\fs28\par \cf0\b0\fs24 Released November 2025\par \cf2\b\par New Features\par \cf0\b0\f1\lang1033\'a3\'ab\f0 Added Particle Nebula Visualizer. Swirling clouds, glowing bloom halos, and reactive trails create a cosmic, music\f2\_\f0 driven effect.\f1\par \'a3\'ab\f0 Added Circular Spectrum Visualizer, a spoke\f2\_\f0 style frequency display radiating bars around a central ring, with configurable gain, smoothing, and weighting modes.\f1\par \'a3\'ab\f0 Added Oscilloscope Visualizer, technical lines blazing across the screen, with stereo mode and glow trails.\f1\par \'a3\'ab\f0 Added Classic Spectrum Analyzer Visualizer, made to feel like the classic Winamp spectrum bars.\par \f1\'a3\'ab\f0 Added Star Field Visualizer, a gentle flow of stars set to music.\f1\par \'a3\'ab\f0 Added settings for all new visualizers. Complete with sliders to set configurable variables in the visualizers. Saves with the other settings to the Windows Registry.\f1\par \'a3\'ab\f0 Added Hyperspace Tunnel Visualizer. Colorful streaks coming at you.\par \f1\'a3\'ab\f0 Added Fractal Cloud Visualizer. A Swirling mutating cloud.\par \f1\'a3\'ab\f0 Added Waveform Visualizer. Oscilloscope style.\f1\par \'a3\'ab\f0 Added RainbowBars Visualizer. A colorful dance of 30 bars with peak meters.\f1\par \'a3\'ab\f0 New Visualizer System. Based on a contract interface with a modular host. New visualizers can be added easily.\f1\par \'a3\'ab\f0 Added session stats to History & Statistics. Added progress bar for loading.\par \f1\'a3\'ab\f0 Added various Lists and Charts to History & Statistics.\f1\par \'a3\'ab\f0\lang9 Created a hidden DevTools form for viewing the raw History and Plays databases.\par \cf1\b\fs28\par \cf2\fs24 Improvements\par \cf0\b0\f3\u10003?\f4\lang1033 Refactored to Visual Studio 2026. This involved some minor tweaking and style improvements. Still running on .NET 9.0. Planning to upgrade to .NET 10.0 in the coming months.\f5\lang9\par \f3\u10003?\f4\lang1033 Refactored Visualizer system. Created a panel to dock the Visualizer Host. Removed old timer and picturebox system.\f5\lang9\par \f3\u10003?\f4\lang1033 \f0 Refactored Meters to use NAudio instead of CoreAudio. Meters run at a 20fps rate with smooth drop offs.\cf2\b\lang9\par \cf0\b0\f3\u10003?\f4\lang1033 Refactored tooltips throughout the app to overcome ToolTipEX's deficiencies. In some cases this meant strictly controlling ToolTipEX's life-cycle, in other cases completely swapping to another component. This should solve the disappearing tooltips issue.\f5\lang9\par \f3\u10003?\f4\lang1033 Improved History & Statistics loading and data logic.\par \f3\lang9\u10003?\f4\lang1033 Improved History & Statistics UI\f5\lang9\par \f3\u10003?\f0 Began implementing a new tooltip system to avoid ToolTipEX implementation problems.\par \cf1\b\fs28\par \cf2\fs24 Fixes\par \cf0\b0\f3\u10005?\f4\lang1033 Fixed potential crashing during History loading caused by concurrent background updates to history data.\f5\lang9\par \f3\u10005?\f4\lang1033 Removed Core Audio because of conflicts with NAudio, which is needed for new Visualizer system.\f5\lang9\par \f3\u10005?\f4\lang1033 Fixed various bugs in History & Statistics.\f5\lang9\par \f3\u10005? \f4\lang1033 Fixed lyrics display error when loading plain text or metadata lyrics and published hotfix.\cf1\b\f0\fs28\lang9\par \par \fs24 Skye Music v1.0\par This upgrade marks a major milestone in SkyeMusic\f2\rquote\f0 s playback architecture \f2\emdash smoother, smarter, and built to last.\par \cf0\b0\f0 Released November 2025\cf1\b\fs28\par \par \cf2\fs24 New Features\par \cf0\b0\f1\lang1033\'a3\'ab\f0\lang9 Implemented a Plays Database using SQLite to track the actual plays per track and their duration.\par \f1\lang1033\'a3\'ab\f0\lang9 Full synced lyrics view with RichTextBox display. Current lyric line now bolded in real time with smooth switching between album\f2\_art view (single line) and full\_lyrics view\f0\lang1033 . Requires a matching '.LRC' file alongside the audio file for synced audio.\lang9\par \f1\lang1033\'a3\'ab\f0\lang9 History & Statistics page\par \f6\u8594?\f0 \lang9 Added play stats: most played song, total songs, total duration\par \f6\u8594?\f0 \lang9 Added 7\f2\_column list view (Title, Artist, Album, Genre, Plays, Last Played, Path)\par \f6\u8594?\f0 \f2\lang9 Added multiple views: Most Played, Recently Played, Favorites\par \f6\u8594?\f0 \f2\lang9 Added integrated charts: Genre Pie, Genre Polar, Genre Pareto, Artist Bar, Artist Word Cloud\par \f6\u8594?\f0 \f2\lang9 Applied theme\_aware styling to charts and list view\par \f6\u8594?\f0 \f2\lang9 Added context menu actions: Queue selected, Add selected to playlist\par \f1\lang1033\'a3\'ab\f0\lang9 A Text Label has been added where the Album Art button was located. This may be used in the future for song information or a lyrics display.\par \f1\lang1033\'a3\'ab\f0\lang9 Full VLC Integration. Replaced legacy Windows Media Player(WMP) with modern LibVLC backend for improved format support and performance.\par \f1\lang1033\'a3\'ab\f0\lang9 Custom Fullscreen Mode. Implemented fullscreen support from scratch, tailored for VLC\f2\rquote\f0 s rendering model.\par \cf2\b\par Improvements\par \cf0\b0\f3\u10003?\f0 Refactored Plays Database PlayTrigger logic:\par \f6\u8594?\f0 Defaulted to Manual unless AutoTrigger flag is set\par \f6\u8594?\f0 Simplified intent tracking across playback paths\par \f6\u8594?\f0 Logging now includes accurate trigger context\par \f6\u8594?\f0 This change makes play history smarter without complicating playback flow.\lang9\par \f3\u10003?\f0 \lang1033 Lyrics support includes '.LRC' files, plain text files, and metadata from the song file itself.\par \f3\lang9\u10003?\f0 \lang1033 Cycle through Album Art simply by left-clicking the Art. The Album Art button has been removed.\par \f3\lang9\u10003?\f0 Audio Playback Update. Improved stability by aligning with system audio settings. Tip: For best results, set your playback device to 16\f2\_bit, 44.1 kHz (CD Quality).\f0\lang1033 \f2\lang9 This matches most music files and avoids unnecessary resampling that can cause static.\f0\par \f3\u10003?\f0 Hook Reliability. Improved timing and resilience of mouse hook attachment to VLC\f2\rquote\f0 s native window.\par \f3\u10003?\f0 Playback Lifecycle Management. Smoothed transitions between playback states to prevent UI hangs and race conditions.\par \f3\u10003?\f0 FullScreen Usage and Stability Overhaul. Added keyboard shortcuts and uniform click events to fullscreen functionality. Increased stability and reliability of fullscreen mode.\par \cf2\b\par Fixes\par \cf0\b0\f3\u10005? \f4\lang1033 Fixed lyrics sync problem in Lyrics View.\f5\lang9\par \f3\u10005? Fixed repeat mode bug\f4\lang1033 , \f5\lang9 playback now restarts correctly at end of song\par \f3\u10005?\f0 Fixed RichTextBox cursor flicker by subclassing and overriding WM_SETCURSOR\par \f3\u10005?\f0 MPEG playback timing issue stabilized. A\f2 dded a startup timer to safely grab video dimensions and toggle mute, eliminating divide\_by\_zero and silent playback quirks.\f0\par \f3\u10005?\f0 Fixed errors when loading history and statistics page and user interacts by clicking a button or closing prematurely.\par \f3\u10005?\f0 Ensured all UI updates are safely marshaled to the main thread\par \f3\u10005?\f0 Various FullScreen Lifecylce and Stability fixes.\par \f3\u10005?\f0 File System Watcher now updates Playlist Count when removing files.\par \cf1\b\par Skye Music v0.8\par \cf0\b0 Released October 2025\par \par \cf2\b New Features\par \cf0\b0\f1\lang1033\'a3\'ab\f0\lang9 History tracking now includes Total Played Songs and Session Total\par \f1\lang1033\'a3\'ab\f0\lang9 What's New Form to keep a rolling list of Features, Improvements, and Fixes. Located in the About Box.\par \f1\lang1033\'a3\'ab\f0\lang9 Drag-and-Drop Playlist Import. Just drop a playlist file into the Playlist and watch it merge seamlessly.\par \f1\lang1033\'a3\'ab\f0\lang9 Merge-on-Import Logic. Playlist entries are intelligently added or updated without duplicates.\par \f1\lang1033\'a3\'ab\f0\lang9 Playlist Export to various formats.\par \f1\lang1033\'a3\'ab\f0\lang9 Status Messages. These will provide the user with valuable information about actions performed and provide feedback for automated processes. They will appear under the Playlist and disappear automatically. A new setting was added to the Playlist section to control how long they appear or if they appear at all.\par \par \cf2\b Improvements\par \cf0\b0\f3\u10003?\f0 History saving upgraded with Schema versioning for easier future updates, while maintaining backward compatibility.\par \f3\u10003?\f0 Centralized Import Logic. Shared method now powers both dialog and drag & drop workflows.\par \f3\u10003?\f0 Cleaner Diagnostics. WriteToLog now tracks media vs playlist drops.\par \f3\u10003?\f0 Laid the foundation for transition to VLC Media Player as the media engine for Skye Music.\par \par \cf2\b Fixes\par \cf0\b0\f3\u10005?\f0 Tooltip lifecycle stabilized.\par \f3\u10005?\f0 Normalized web URLs for consistency and future VLC support by removing ending "/" characters. Windows Media Player adds this character automatically.\par \par \cf1\b\fs28 Thank you for using Skye Music!\cf0\b0\fs24\par }
